import os
import re
import json
import shutil
from pathlib import Path
from typing import Dict, List, Set, Union, Any

# Emoji è¡¨æƒ…é›†åˆï¼ŒåŒ…å«åŠ¨ç‰©ä¸è‡ªç„¶ã€é£Ÿç‰©ä¸é¥®æ–™ã€æ´»åŠ¨ã€ç‰©ä½“ã€æ—…è¡Œä¸åœ°ç‚¹ç­‰ç±»åˆ«
EMOJI_POOL = [
    # åŠ¨ç‰©ä¸è‡ªç„¶
    'ğŸ¥', 'ğŸ› ï¸', 'ğŸ¨', 'âŒ¨ï¸', 'ğŸ­', 'ğŸš¿', 'ğŸŒš', 'ğŸ§€', 'ğŸš', 'ğŸ¬', 
    'â˜ï¸', 'ğŸš¢', 'ğŸŒ¹', 'ğŸŒ', 'ğŸ“', 'ğŸ±', 'ğŸ¾', 'ğŸ¥”', 'ğŸ¨', 'ğŸ§', 
    'ğŸ”Œ', 'ğŸµ', 'âœ¨', 'ğŸŠ', 'ğŸ¯', 'ğŸ–¥ï¸', 'ğŸ', 'ğŸŒ ', 'ğŸ‡', 'ğŸ™', 
    'ğŸ…', 'ğŸŒ±', 'ğŸ—', 'ğŸŒ»', 'â›µ', 'ğŸŒ–', 'ğŸŒ', 'ğŸ§', 'ğŸ¿', 'â›·ï¸', 
    'â˜€ï¸', 'â­', 'âœ¨', 'ğŸª', 'â˜ï¸', 'ğŸŒï¸', 'â›…', 'â„ï¸', 'ğŸ•¹ï¸', 'ğŸ·',
    
    # é£Ÿç‰©ä¸é¥®æ–™
    'ğŸ¼', 'ğŸ’', 'ğŸš', 'ğŸ³', 'ğŸ“½ï¸', 'ğŸ', 'â›…', 'ğŸ­', 'ğŸ¥—', 'ğŸ‘', 
    'ğŸ±', 'ğŸ‰', 'ğŸ’»', 'ğŸˆ', 'ğŸ¤', 'ğŸ“', 'ğŸ¥®ï¸', 'ğŸ”§', 'ğŸ‰', 'ğŸ”¦', 
    'ğŸš†', 'ğŸ£', 'ğŸ¦', 'ğŸ›‹ï¸', 'ğŸ–¨ï¸', 'ğŸš€', 'âš½', 'ğŸ§°', 'ğŸ³', 'ğŸ¥˜', 
    'ğŸŒ¶ï¸', 'ğŸŒº', 'ğŸ“¸', 'ğŸŒ˜', 'âš½', 'ğŸš', 'ğŸ»', 'ğŸ¥©', 'ğŸŒ¸', 'ğŸ¥“', 
    'ğŸ’¦', 'ğŸš', 'ğŸš½', 'ğŸ¦Š', 'â­', 'ğŸŒ›', 'ğŸŒµ', 'ğŸ“¼', 'ğŸ“Ÿ', 'ğŸ¥„',
    
    # æ´»åŠ¨
    'âš½', 'ğŸ¥‡', 'ğŸš‚', 'âš¾', 'ğŸ·', 'ğŸŒ§ï¸', 'ğŸ•¹ï¸', 'ğŸ¹', 'ğŸ', 'ğŸ”¬', 
    'â›³', 'ğŸŒ²ï¸', 'â„ï¸', 'ğŸ‡', 'ğŸŒ¼', 'â›·ï¸', 'ğŸ²', 'ğŸƒ', 'ğŸ“½ï¸ï¸', 'â›³', 
    'ğŸƒ', 'ğŸ€', 'ğŸ£', 'ğŸ¢', 'ğŸ¯', 'ğŸˆ', 'ğŸ¥', 'ğŸ”', 'ğŸï¸', 'ğŸ–', 
    'ğŸ”ª', 'ğŸª', 'ğŸ“', 'ğŸ†', 'ğŸš‰', 'ğŸ¤', 'ğŸ¥', 'ğŸ‹', 'ğŸ®', 'ğŸ²', 
    'ğŸ“€', 'ğŸ¥•', 'âš½', 'ğŸ¥‡', 'ğŸš‚', 'âš¾', 'ğŸ·', 'ğŸŒ§ï¸', 'ğŸ•¹ï¸', 'ğŸ¹',
    
    # ç‰©ä½“
    'ğŸ§', 'ğŸšŒ', 'ğŸ¦', 'ğŸ', 'ğŸŠ', 'âŒ¨ï¸', 'ğŸ¼ï¸', 'ğŸŒï¸ï¸', 'ğŸ“½ï¸ï¸', 'ğŸƒ', 
    'ğŸ¤', 'ğŸ”©', 'ğŸ¿', 'ğŸŒ•', 'ğŸ”¨', 'ğŸ¸', 'ğŸ¥ˆ', 'ğŸ»', 'ğŸï¸', 'ğŸ…', 
    'ğŸ”‹', 'ğŸŒ', 'ğŸ¹', 'ğŸ“·', 'ğŸª‘', 'ğŸ¥­ï¸', 'ğŸ”', 'ğŸ†', 'ğŸ¥–', 'ğŸ‰', 
    'ğŸ¦', 'âš’ï¸', 'â˜€ï¸ï¸', 'ğŸ±', 'ğŸŒ³', 'ğŸ®', 'ğŸ˜', 'ğŸšŠ', 'âš¾', 'ğŸ¤', 
    'ğŸ”­', 'ğŸœ', 'ğŸ¯', 'ğŸˆ', 'ğŸ¥', 'ğŸ”', 'ğŸï¸', 'ğŸ–', 'ğŸ”ª', 'ğŸª',
    
    # æ—…è¡Œä¸åœ°ç‚¹
    'âœˆï¸', 'ğŸ’½', 'ğŸ´', 'â›µ', 'ğŸ€', 'ğŸšª', 'ğŸ­', 'ğŸ¥', 'ğŸ¥‰', 'ğŸ', 
    'ğŸ°', 'ğŸ”', 'ğŸ”¥', 'âš’ï¸', 'ğŸ¸', 'ğŸ“ ', 'âœˆï¸', 'ğŸ¬', 'ğŸ’¾', 'ğŸš', 
    'ğŸ¼', 'ğŸ¡', 'ğŸ’¡', 'ğŸ±', 'ğŸŸ', 'ğŸ“±', 'ğŸ ï¸', 'ğŸ¥ï¸', 'ğŸš…ï¸', 'âš¾', 
    'ğŸŒ—', 'ğŸ¾', 'ğŸ¶', 'ğŸ¸', 'ğŸ›', 'ğŸŒ¯', 'ğŸ¨', 'ğŸª‘', 'ğŸŒ™', 'ğŸ’¿', 
    'ğŸš‡ï¸', 'ğŸ”', 'ğŸˆ', 'ğŸ', 'ğŸ“½ï¸', 'ğŸ®', 'ğŸŒ´ï¸', 'ğŸš´', 'ğŸšµ', 'ğŸŒ½'
]

# Emoji æ­£åˆ™è¡¨è¾¾å¼æ¨¡å¼
EMOJI_REGEX = re.compile(r'[\U0001F300-\U0001F64F\U0001F680-\U0001F6FF\U0001F900-\U0001F9FF\U0001F1E0-\U0001F1FF]')

class EmojiProcessor:
    def __init__(self):
        """åˆå§‹åŒ–Emojiå¤„ç†å™¨"""
        self.emoji_pool = EMOJI_POOL
        self.emoji_index = 0
    
    def get_next_emoji(self) -> str:
        """è·å–ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªEmojiï¼Œå½“æ± ç”¨å°½æ—¶å¾ªç¯ä½¿ç”¨"""
        emoji = self.emoji_pool[self.emoji_index]
        self.emoji_index = (self.emoji_index + 1) % len(self.emoji_pool)
        return emoji
    
    def replace_emojis(self, content: str) -> str:
        """æ›¿æ¢æ–‡æœ¬ä¸­çš„Emojiä¸ºæ–°çš„Emoji"""
        # æå–æ‰€æœ‰Emojiå¹¶å»é‡
        unique_emojis = set(EMOJI_REGEX.findall(content))
        
        # åˆ›å»ºEmojiæ˜ å°„
        emoji_mapping = {old_emoji: self.get_next_emoji() for old_emoji in unique_emojis}
        
        # æ›¿æ¢Emoji
        return EMOJI_REGEX.sub(lambda match: emoji_mapping.get(match.group(0), match.group(0)), content)
    
    def process_json(self, content: Union[Dict, List]) -> Union[Dict, List]:
        """å¤„ç†JSONå†…å®¹ï¼Œé€’å½’æ›¿æ¢å…¶ä¸­çš„Emoji"""
        if isinstance(content, dict):
            return {k: self.process_json(v) for k, v in content.items()}
        elif isinstance(content, list):
            return [self.process_json(item) for item in content]
        elif isinstance(content, str):
            return self.replace_emojis(content)
        else:
            return content
    
    def process_file(self, input_path: Path, output_path: Path) -> None:
        """å¤„ç†å•ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶"""
        try:
            # è¯»å–æ–‡ä»¶å†…å®¹
            if input_path.suffix.lower() == '.json':
                with open(input_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                    content = json.load(f)
                # å¤„ç†JSONå†…å®¹
                processed_content = self.process_json(content)
                # å†™å…¥JSONæ–‡ä»¶
                with open(output_path, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                    json.dump(processed_content, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)
            else:
                # å¤„ç†æ™®é€šæ–‡æœ¬æ–‡ä»¶
                with open(input_path, 'r', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                    content = f.read()
                processed_content = self.replace_emojis(content)
                # å†™å…¥JSONæ–‡ä»¶
                output_data = {
                    "original_file": str(input_path),
                    "content": processed_content
                }
                with open(output_path, 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f:
                    json.dump(output_data, f, ensure_ascii=False, indent=2)
            print(f"å·²å¤„ç†: {input_path} -> {output_path}")
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"å¤„ç†æ–‡ä»¶ {input_path} æ—¶å‡ºé”™: {e}")
    
    def process_directory(self, input_dir: Path, output_dir: Path) -> None:
        """å¤„ç†ç›®å½•ä¸­çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶"""
        # åˆ›å»ºè¾“å‡ºç›®å½•
        output_dir.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)
        
        # å¤„ç†æ‰€æœ‰æ–‡ä»¶
        for item in input_dir.iterdir():
            # è·³è¿‡è¾“å‡ºç›®å½•ï¼Œé¿å…æ— é™é€’å½’
            if item.is_dir() and item == output_dir:
                continue
                
            if item.is_file():
                # æ„å»ºè¾“å‡ºæ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„ï¼Œä¿æŒæ–‡ä»¶åç›¸åŒä½†æ‰©å±•åä¸º.json
                output_file = output_dir / (item.stem + '.json')
                self.process_file(item, output_file)
            elif item.is_dir():
                # é€’å½’å¤„ç†å­ç›®å½•
                sub_output_dir = output_dir / item.name
                self.process_directory(item, sub_output_dir)

def main():
    """ä¸»å‡½æ•°"""
    # è·å–å½“å‰å·¥ä½œç›®å½•
    current_dir = Path.cwd()
    
    # é»˜è®¤è¾“å…¥å’Œè¾“å‡ºç›®å½•
    input_dir = current_dir / 'emojis'
    output_dir = input_dir / 'output'  # ä¿®æ”¹è¾“å‡ºç›®å½•ä¸º emojis/output
    
    # æ£€æŸ¥è¾“å…¥ç›®å½•æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
    if not input_dir.exists():
        print(f"é”™è¯¯: è¾“å…¥ç›®å½• '{input_dir}' ä¸å­˜åœ¨")
        return
    
    # å¤„ç†ç›®å½•
    processor = EmojiProcessor()
    processor.process_directory(input_dir, output_dir)
    
    print("å¤„ç†å®Œæˆ!")
    print(f"å¤„ç†åçš„æ–‡ä»¶å·²ä¿å­˜åœ¨: {output_dir}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
